title: Price exceeds MC and AVC, producing too little

content.prompt: If a perfectly competitive firm wishes to maximize profits and is producing where price exceeds both marginal cost and average variable cost, then the firm is

choices.label: producing where its marginal revenue is less than its marginal cost
using too much of the variable input
charging too high a price for its output
